DOC.brief_summary: This is a clinical study investigating pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamic effects and safety of BAY 59-7939 in patients with atrial fibrillation (originally described in Japanese).
DOC.brief_title: BAY59-7939, Japanese Phase II in Atrial FibrillationTrial Status
DOC.criteria: 20 years or older Japanese male or female Non valvular atrial fibrillation documented by ECG Patients aged 60 years and older or with a risk of stroke Prior stroke and TIA Patients in whom anticoagulants are contraindicated
